Articles.Content:
im wondering what kind of music do you people think kerbal should have? , like in what style and when would you want music?, i mean, all the time? , on launch? on landing?

i kinda imagin the kerbal music in the old WB style. that may be cuz i like jazz Xd.

Powerhouse by Raymond Scott should play while in the VAB or SPH.

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
Clint Mansell - Welcome to Lunar Industries When flying to Mun 8)

I really just think they listen to this, and only this, on infinite loop in the Command Pod.

Not because they like it, but because I hate them.

so diferent styles here, i bet is gona be hard to give kerbal a soundtrack .

Powerhouse by Raymond Scott should play while in the VAB or SPH.

i forgot about the building music, important part indeed, and like the song xD , i still fell thats the way to go for kerbals, even tho

I really just think they listen to this, and only this, on infinite loop in the Command Pod.

i can imagine jeb driving like a maniac with this song and a picture on the command pod to match it.

Clint Mansell - Welcome to Lunar Industries When flying to Mun 8)

maybe its just me but ill get depressd if im listening to this while the earth gets smaller.

/sorry if english faild
I hope the main theme tune is something along these lines:

Well, the intro should have a short synth sound, like for the intro of this budding series on ksp:

As for some misc. music, I\'ll vote for 'My Canary has Circles Under his Eyes' by the Captain Matchbox Whoopee Band. None of the youtube uploads or music site previews I can find really show off the song as it is meant to be; there\'s one youtube video with half the audio so quiet it\'s impossible to hear. I might link to a preview, after finding the copyright information.

OK I think I just decided to knock together some incidental music. I am a musician, and I have tons of recording gear and I also know how to use it. :-)

I would offer it to the KSP team as a \'take it or leave it, royalty-free\' kind of deal. If I get my act together, that is!
